data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 6,732 believers in Qom, Iran a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Qom, Iran

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Qom.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Qom, Iran.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 6,732 believers in Qom, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Qom who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Khalaj, Turkic people might believe through him.
Father, move the 6,732 believers in the state of Qom to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 6,732 believers in the state of Qom the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

data.section_summary:
the state of Qom, Iran has a population of 1,292,300.

We estimate Qom has 6,732 people who might know Jesus, 17,451 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,268,117 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Qom. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.
